name: list_of_cities_in_one_country
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool climate_data.
Tool description: climate data worldwide
API description: Gets a list of cities in a specified country using the Climate Data API.

country.description: The country code for which to retrieve the list of cities.

lang.description: The language code for the response data. Options are ['en', 'fr', 'pl', 'pt', 'es', 'it', 'gr', 'tr', 'ru', 'cn', 'cz']. Default is 'en'.
